title: Amazon FBA Product Research and Development Specialist (Philippines Region)
job_overview:
Amazon FBA Product Research and Development Specialist (Philippines Region)

Job Overview
We are a dynamic, US-based startup specializing in selling products through the Amazon FBA platform. As we continue to expand, we are looking for exceptional talent to join our remote team in the Philippines. If you're a fast learner with a passion for product research and development, this is your opportunity to grow with a company that values integrity and innovation.

Job Description:
No previous Amazon experience is required, but the ideal candidate should possess the following qualities:

What You’ll Do:
Learning & Adaptability: Ability to quickly self-learn and conduct research to understand competitor products and categories. Find niche markets with strong growth opportunities.
Strong Market Research Skills: Identify product opportunities with strong sales potential, minimal competition, and strong profit margins after deducting product costs.
Creative & Analytical Mindset: Develop impactful product concepts that align with market needs, and use customer feedback to enhance product functionality, packaging, or manuals to boost satisfaction. Your ideas should upgrade existing products in the market, not simply copy ideas.
Evaluate Product Samples & Validate Product Concepts: Ensure product quality and functionality meet specifications. Based on product samples, identify necessary improvements and refine the product. The final product should be enhanced based on feedback and ready for customer satisfaction.
Coordination: Collaborate with brand managers, sourcing personnel, and designers for product documentation and design requirements, working together to develop products that solve customer pain points and deliver exceptional value.
Team Collaboration: Actively share insights, ask questions, and willingly contribute ideas to help improve company workflows and documentation.
Time Management: Complete tasks efficiently, meeting deadlines with great attention to detail.
Honesty & Integrity: Exhibit high professional ethics, maintain confidentiality, and ensure the accuracy and reliability of product information.

Compensation and Benefits:
Starting salary: $2.50/hour + $50 per successful product, paid monthly.
After a 3-6 month trial period, hourly rate increases to $3 or more based on performance, with top performers eligible for a monthly salary of $500 or higher.
Long-term role with growth to Brand Manager or leadership positions.
Fully remote with training in Amazon SEO and visual design.
Join a vibrant global team driving e-commerce excellence.

Note: This job description is not exhaustive. Additional activities, duties, or responsibilities may be assigned as needed.

How to Apply:
To apply, please complete the Google Form Applications below. Applications will only be processed through this form. We will not check messages on Onlinejobs.ph.
